definition: حنق ḥaniqa a (ḥanaq) to be furious, mad, angry; to be annoyed, exasperated, peeved, irritated (على or من at, by), be resentful (على or من of) IV to infuriate, enrage, embitter, exasperate, irritate (ه s.o.) حنق ḥanaq fury, rage, ire, wrath, anger, exasperation, resentment, rancor حنق ḥaniq furious, mad, angry; resentful, bitter, embittered, annoyed, exasperated, peeved
